sense.def:
To repay money
pomeni vrniti denar človeku, od katerega smo si ga izposodili ali ga vzeli.

seg.quote: He plans to repay most of that debt.
He ordered the President to repay the money to the State.

sense.def:
To repay a favour
pomeni narediti nekaj, s čimer se zahvalimo človeku, ki nam je naredil uslugo.

seg.quote: We hope we can repay you for the pleasure you have given us.
